Subbed Projects.Show Name: Oniichan no Koto nanka Zenzen Suki ja Nai n da kara ne!!

Good Comments: "yup yup" "fapping" These guys are trolling. I know it's not a serious show, but that doesn't mean you have to word the subs like a 12 year old.
"No, siblings in this day and age would do such a thing!" Way to completely invert the meaning with a superfluous comma there. And there's more editing phail where that came from.
Horrible editing, structure of sentences is far below par.
They release SD, thank god. Otherwise, could've been better, but oh well.
No grammar and spelling errors? You're fucking kidding, right?
Good subs.... And nice kara too.....
Bad Comments: Great subs. No spelling or grammar errors.
Do we really need TL Notes telling us what frankfurters are?

Meh. I'm fine with it. About the word-usage:  As part of the show's humor is it's shockingly blunt lines, I think heavy word-usage like "fapping" suits the intention and emphases the "in your face"-factor.
The subs themselves are good, but releases are irregular and GotWoot's are overall better
